ref.div: Zhang, K., Peters, J., Janzing, D. & Schölkopf, B. Kernel-based conditional independence test and application in causal discovery. In Proceedings of the 27th Conference on Uncertainty in Artificial Intelligence (eds. Cozman, F. Pfeffer, A.) 804–813 (AUAI Press, Corvallis, Oregon, USA, 2011).
